events.title: Meeting: Independent Map Amendment
events.location: Downers Grove Public Library, 1050 Curtiss St., Downers Grove, IL
events.Description:
Meeting: Independent Map Amendment

Thu - 7 PM

Downers Grove Public Library, 1050 Curtiss St., Downers Grove, IL

Topic: "Drawing fair lines: Why Illinois citizens are tackling gerrymandering with the Independent Map Amendment." Chris Butler, campaign field director, and Ron Sandack, state representative of Illinois's 81st district, will be joining us for a conversation about what we learned from the Yes for Independent Maps effort and progress being made going into 2016. Please RSVP to this free event by clicking the Interested button on the Facebook event page https://www.facebook.com/events/967052783338125/ or emailing indymapsdg@gmail.com with your full name to secure your seat in the meeting room.

utility.Description:
Utility bills are due every other month. Alternating the north and south sides of the BNSF railroad.

Information regarding the water portion of the utility bill can be found here.

Information regarding the stormwater portion of your utility bill can be found here.

Please use this link to pay bills on-line.
